revised_title: Toxicity and Effects of Laurel Water on Dogs: An Experimental Study
tldr: The author conducts experiments on dogs to study the toxic effects of water distilled from the laurel plant. The results show that the substance causes convulsions, vomiting, and death in the tested animals, with the larger dog taking longer to succumb to the poison. The study provides insight into the potential dangers of laurel water and its effects on the body.
